name: 2011 University of Plymouth Falmouth towed underwater video maerl and associated epifauna survey
description: Survey to establish the location and assess the extent, distribution and species composition of maerl bedhabitats and quantify the abundance of associated epifauna communities in Falmouth Harbour, UK using a high definitiontowed underwater video system. Surveys were conducted in response to proposed dredging activities to deepen the shipping channel. The survey took place inNovember 2011 and transects were approximately 200 x 0.5 metres
